content.Title: Connecting to SAP BW in Domo
content.Article Body:
Overview
                       

                        To connect to SAP BW data in Domo, you must establish a DOMO-SAP data link. To do this, you will go through all of the following steps:
                       




                           Establish an RFC connection between DOMO and BW
                          





                           Create a Logical File
                          





                           Find the Data Structure of your BW Object
                          





                           Build your APD
                          






                          Step 1: Establishing an RFC connection between Domo and BW
                         





                          In mySAP ERP, run Transaction
                          
                           SM59
                          
                          .
                          






                          Select
                          
                           HTTP Connections to External Server
                          
                          and click
                          
                           Create
                          
                          .
                          






                          Fill in the following fields:
                         




                             RFC Destination
                            





                             Description 1
                            





                             Target Host
                            





                             Service No.
                            





                             Path Prefix
                            









                          Click the
                          
                           Logon & Security
                          
                          tab.
                         



                          Select the
                          
                           Basic Authentication
                          
                          radio button.
                          






                          Scroll down and enter a username and password.
                          






                          Click
                          
                           Save
                          
                          .
                         



                        Your RFC connection is now established.
                       

                        Step 2: Creating a Logical File
                       



                          In mySAP ERP, run Transaction
                          
                           FILE
                          
                          .
                         



                          Select
                          
                           New Entries
                          
                          .
                          






                          Fill in the fields as follows:
                         





                              Logical file
                             




                               Z_DOMO_DROP_FILE
                              






                              Name
                             




                               Domo drop
                              






                              Physical file
                             




                               DOMO TEST<YEAR><MONTH><DATE>_<HOUR><MINUTE><SECOND>.csv
                              






                              Data format
                             




                               ASC
                              






                              Applicat.area
                             




                               FI
                              






                              Logical path
                             




                               Z_DOMO_DROP
                              











                          Click
                          
                           Save
                          
                          .
                         



                          Enter your transport information.
                         



                        Step 3: Finding the Data Structure of your BW Object
                       



                          In Data Warehousing Workbench, run transaction
                          
                           RSA1
                          
                          .
                         



                          Select
                          
                           BI Content
                          
                          .
                          






                          Navigate to the desired BW object and double-click it.
                         



                          Click
                          
                           Key Figures
                          
                          .
                          






                        The data structure of the object opens for you to view.
                       

                        Step 4: Building Your APD
                       



                          In Data Warehousing Workbench, run transaction
                          
                           RSA1
                          
                          .
                         



                          Open the Analysis Process Designer (APD).
                          






                          Select
                          
                           General
                          
                          then click
                          
                           Create
                          
                          .
                          






                          Select
                          
                           General Application
                          
                          .
                          






                          Enter a description in the
                          
                           Description
                          
                          field.
                         



                          Select your Data Source (in this case an InfoProvider).
                          






                          Name the Data Source.
                         



                          Select an InfoProvider.
                          
                          You can also limit the fields sent.
                          














                          Select
                          
                           Write Data to File
                          
                          .
                          









                          In the
                          
                           Data Target: File
                          
                          dialog, do the following:
                         



                            Enter a description for the file in the
                            
                             Description
                            
                            field.
                           



                            Select the
                            
                             Application Server
                            
                            radio button.
                           



                            Check the box for
                            
                             Logical File Name
                            
                            .
                           



                            Enter your new logical file name in the
                            
                             File
                            
                            field.
                           



                            Click the green check box.
                            









                          Click and drag to connect the nodes.
                          






                          Save your changes.
                         



                          Click the
                          
                           Activate
                          
                          icon.
content.Primary Version: Connecting to SAP BW in Domo

title: Connecting to SAP BW in Domo
